title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Soquel Demonstration State Forest, California
content:
Photo submitted by Daryl Yee, “Nestled in the Santa Cruz Mountains is the well-known Soquel Demonstration State Forest and the famous Braille Trail and Flow Trail. Demo (as it is also known) is a beautiful place to mountain bike amongst the giant California Redwoods.” We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and […]

The post Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Soquel Demonstration State Forest, California appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Kristi Benedict
